sectiondef.header: TLE9xxx.hpp - Arduino library to control Infineon's BLDC Motor Control Shield with Tle9xxx

description.para: This library includes the generic functions for TLE9xxx family Tle9xxxcorelib

Infineon Technologies AG
2021 Infineon Technologies AG
2.0.0
SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT

briefdescription.para: Main place to configure the TLE9xxx. All defines beginning with "CONF_" are intended to be changed by the user. All other defines should remain as they are.

detaileddescription.para: A value > 0.5 gives more importance to the last tRISE sampled A value < 0.5 gives more importance to the history of sampled tRISE
